Ádám Váradi; Hunvadam; Chickenpox Cases in Hungary; https://graphai-datasets.web.app/hungary_county_edges.csv; Description A spatio-temporal dataset of weekly chickenpox (childhood disease) cases from Hungary. The dataset consists of a county-level adjacency matrix of the county-level reported cases between 2005 and 2015.
title={{Chickenpox Cases in Hungary: a Benchmark Dataset for Spatiotemporal Signal Processing with Graph Neural Networks}}
author={Benedek Rozemberczki and Paul Scherer and Oliver Kiss and Rik Sarkar and Tamas Ferenci}
